statements: SELECT * FROM survey_metadata
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, completion_status FROM survey_metadata
SELECT survey_id, respondent_id FROM survey_metadata WHERE completion_status = 'Complete'
SELECT * FROM survey_metadata WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT respondent_id, survey_date FROM survey_metadata ORDER BY survey_date DESC
SELECT * FROM survey_metadata WHERE completion_status = 'Completed';
SELECT survey_id, survey_date FROM survey_metadata WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT respondent_id, COUNT(*) AS total_surveys FROM survey_metadata GROUP BY respondent_id HAVING total_surveys > 5;
SELECT * FROM survey_metadata ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(respondent_id) AS avg_respondent_id FROM survey_metadata;
SELECT * FROM survey_metadata;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date FROM survey_metadata WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT respondent_name, email_address FROM respondent_info ORDER BY respondent_name ASC;
SELECT survey_id, respondent_name, completion_status FROM survey_metadata JOIN respondent_info ON survey_metadata.respondent_id = respondent_info.respondent_id;
SELECT * FROM survey_metadata WHERE completion_status = 'Complete';
SELECT * FROM survey_metadata WHERE survey_id = 123;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, respondent_id FROM survey_metadata WHERE completion_status = 'Complete' ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT respondent_name, email_address FROM respondent_info WHERE respondent_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY respondent_name ASC;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, respondent_name FROM survey_metadata m JOIN respondent_info i ON m.respondent_id = i.respondent_id WHERE m.completion_status = 'Incomplete';
SELECT respondent_name, email_address FROM respondent_info WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Respondents;
SELECT survey_date, completion_status FROM SurveyMetadata WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT respondent_name FROM Respondents WHERE respondent_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT survey_id, respondent_id FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT respondent_name, email_address FROM Respondents WHERE respondent_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT * FROM SurveyMetadata;
SELECT respondent_id, respondent_name, email_address FROM Respondents WHERE respondent_id = 1;
SELECT survey_id, MAX(survey_date) AS latest_survey_date FROM SurveyMetadata GROUP BY survey_id;
SELECT survey_id, respondent_id, COUNT(question_id) AS total_questions_answered FROM SurveyResponses GROUP BY survey_id, respondent_id;

SELECT respondent_name, question_id, answer FROM Respondents JOIN SurveyResponses ON Respondents.respondent_id = SurveyResponses.respondent_id WHERE respondent_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY question_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_dates;
SELECT * FROM respondent_ids WHERE respondent_id = 123;
SELECT respondent_name, respondent_id FROM respondent_ids ORDER BY respondent_name DESC;
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM survey_responses GROUP BY survey_id;
SELECT survey_id, respondent_id, response_text FROM survey_responses WHERE completion_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM survey_dates JOIN respondent_ids ON survey_dates.survey_id = respondent_ids.respondent_id;
SELECT survey_id, respondent_id, COUNT(*) FROM survey_responses GROUP BY survey_id, respondent_id ORDER BY survey_id DESC;

SELECT survey_date, respondent_name, completion_status FROM survey_dates JOIN respondent_ids ON survey_dates.survey_id = respondent_ids.respondent_id JOIN completion_statuses ON survey_dates.survey_id = completion_statuses.survey_id WHERE completion_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY survey_date ASC;

SELECT respondent_name, response_text FROM respondent_ids JOIN survey_responses ON respondent_ids.respondent_id = survey_responses.respondent_id WHERE response_text LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY respondent_name;

SELECT respondent_name, completion_status FROM respondent_ids JOIN completion_statuses ON respondent_ids.respondent_id = completion_statuses.survey_id WHERE completion_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY respondent_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyMetadata;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date FROM SurveyMetadata WHERE completion_status='Completed';
SELECT respondent_id, respondent_name FROM RespondentDetails ORDER BY respondent_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id=1 AND respondent_id=1;
SELECT category_name FROM SurveyCategories WHERE category_id=3;
SELECT * FROM SurveyMetadata
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, respondent_id, completion_status FROM SurveyMetadata ORDER BY survey_date DESC
SELECT respondent_name, respondent_email FROM RespondentDetails WHERE respondent_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT question_text, qtype FROM QuestionMetadata WHERE qcategory_id = 2

SELECT sr.response_text, sm.survey_date, rd.respondent_name, qc.category_name FROM SurveyResponses sr JOIN SurveyMetadata sm ON sr.survey_id = sm.survey_id JOIN RespondentDetails rd ON sr.respondent_id = rd.respondent_id JOIN SurveyCategories qc ON qc.category_id = 1
